info.title: @digipair/skill-push-notification
info.description: This skill allows users to send WebPush notifications.

post.description: Send a web push notification with the specified values.

parameters.name: subscription
parameters.description: Subscription object used to send notifications.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Payload to insert into the notification

parameters.name: privateKey
parameters.description: VAPID private key used for authentication.

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.description: VAPID public key used to enable push subscription.

parameters.name: mailto
parameters.description: Admin email for VAPID mailto configuration.
